languages.text: The plasma battery explodes, dealing <u>(from 8 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} and inflicting the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effect on everyone in a 2-cell radius. This explosion has 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
languages.original_text: Плазменная батарея взрывается, нанося <u>(от 8 до 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрического урона{/g} и накладывая эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g} на всех в радиусе 2 клеток. При взрыве {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} составляет 10%.

プラズマバッテリーが爆発して{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を<u>8～32</u>与え、半径2セル以内のすべて者に{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を与える。この爆発での{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}は10%。

languages.text: La batería de plasma explota infligiendo <u>(de 8 a 32)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} y causando el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} a todas las unidades a un radio de 2 casillas. La explosión tiene 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: The plasma battery explodes, dealing <u>(from 8 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} and inflicting the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effect on everyone in a 2-cell radius. This explosion has 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La batería de plasma explota infligiendo 8-32 de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} y causando el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} a todas las unidades a un radio de 2 casillas. La explosión tiene 10 % de penetración de armadura.

languages.text: Die Plasmabatterie explodiert und fügt allen Kreaturen in einem Radius von 2 Feldern <u>(8 bis 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} zu und belegt sie mit {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}. Diese Explosion hat 10 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
languages.original_text: The plasma battery explodes, dealing <u>(from 8 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} and inflicting the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effect on everyone in a 2-cell radius. This explosion has 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Plasma-Batterie explodiert und fügt dadurch jedem innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius 8-32 {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} und den {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} zu. Diese Explosion hat 10 % Rüstungsdurchdringung.

languages.text: La batterie à plasma explose en infligeant <u>(de 8 à 32)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} à tous ceux qui se trouvent dans un rayon de 2 cases. Cette explosion possède une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 10 %.
languages.original_text: The plasma battery explodes, dealing <u>(from 8 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} and inflicting the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effect on everyone in a 2-cell radius. This explosion has 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La batterie à plasma explose en infligeant 8 à 32 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} à tous ceux qui se trouvent dans un rayon de 2 cases. Cette explosion possède une pénétration d'armure de 10 %.

languages.text: Plazma bataryası patlayarak 2 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki herkese <u>(8 ila 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}şok hasarı{/g} verir ve onları {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemletir{/g}. Bu patlama, %10 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahiptir.
